text: Camajapita () is a town in the municipality of San Martín de Hidalgo in the state of Jalisco, Mexico. It has a population of 280 inhabitants.\- Camajapita, San Martín Hidalgo, Jalisco The town takes its name after the adjacent town of Camajapa, which lies on the municipality of Cocula, Jalisco. ==References== ==External links== *Camajapita at PueblosAmerica.com Category:Populated places in Jalisco
title: Camajapita
